job_description:
• Minimum Qualifications- Proven experience designing, executing and launching Dual-sim technology on Phones.
• - Strong Software Engineering skills including design, programming (using C, C++).
• Highly motivated and self-directedExcellent debugging skillsThrive in a collaborative environment and can clearly communicate while confidently driving multiple projects acrossmany teams.
• Obsessively passionate and inquisitive, and seeks to solve everyday problems in innovative ways.
• Laser-focused on the smallest details that are meaningful to our customers.
• Bachelors or Masters in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent.

• Minimum Qualifications5+ years proven experience shipping high quality, tested code on iOS and / or macOSStrong understanding of architectural patterns used in programming for Apple platformsStrong proficiency in Swift and at least one UI framework (SwiftUI, UIKit, AppKit)Committed to encouraging an open and inclusive work environmentDemonstrated ability to communicate effectively, collaborate, and build long-term relationships across the organizationBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.

• Minimum Qualifications5+ years proven experience shipping high quality, tested code on iOS and / or macOSStrong understanding of architectural patterns used in programming for Apple platformsStrong proficiency in Swift and at least one UI framework (SwiftUI, UIKit, AppKit)Committed to encouraging an open and inclusive work environmentDemonstrated ability to communicate effectively, collaborate, and build long-term relationships across the organizationBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.

• Minimum Qualifications3+ years of proven experience related to software automation or developmentExcellent understanding and application of Python scripting languageWorking experience with continuous integration and deployment tools like Jenkins, Kubernetes, BitBucket or GitHubExperience with popular databases like MongoDB and SQLExperience with building and maintaining automation infrastructure.

• Minimum QualificationsBachelor's Degree or foreign equivalent in Information Technology, Computer Science or related fieldEducation and/or experience must include:Creating, maintaining and debugging media systems software on embedded systems.
• Analyzing source code to enhance security and address vulnerabilities.
• Implementing performance analysis to existing and newly developed software.
• Creating performance testing methodologies and reliability of embedded systems.
• Providing reports and analyzing failure scenarios and identifying causes.
• Developing and engineering multi-device communications software using Objective-C/C and C++.
• Implementing communications mechanisms for mesh networks via custom communication protocols.
• Programing multi-threaded software in memory-constrained systems.
